name: Aleksandr Bushmanov
summary:
Senior Frontend / Full-Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable web applications using React, TypeScript, and Node.js.
Passionate about developer experience, performance, and clean architecture.

experiences.description: Focused on audience segmentation and infrastructure reliability.
keyNotes: Built and maintained audience segmentation and delivery tools, powering campaigns for millions of readers
Maintained and extended Node.js proxy services and API integrations, improving response times by 25%
Improved observability (Datadog dashboards, GCP logs), reducing incident resolution time by 40%
Supported infrastructure with Terraform and GCP Pub/Sub, increasing deployment reliability and scalability
Integrated AWS services and secrets management
Increased test coverage to 50%

experiences.description: Worked on a high-performance game launcher for Jagex‚Äôs RuneScape franchise. Focused on UI responsiveness and cross-platform stability.
keyNotes: Developed and optimized a cross-platform desktop launcher using Electron and React Native.
Collaborated with game backend and distribution teams for seamless release integration.
Ensured high UI performance across Windows/macOS platforms.
Shipped critical updates and streamlined bug reporting workflow.

experiences.position: Senior Software Engineer / Cross-Functional Product Expert
experiences.description: Led key frontend and infrastructure initiatives for a large-scale trading platform with 60M+ users.
keyNotes: Engineered decentralized caching for AWS architecture serving 500K+ daily requests.
Refactored legacy codebase, eliminating jQuery and reducing bundle size by 15%.
Established unified dev processes, onboarding guides, and review workflows.
Launched a popular DevRel newsletter for frontend engineers (1300+ subscribers).
Integrated a custom analytics system to replace Amplitude for cost efficiency.
Prototyped high-performance charting tools using FlatBuffers.

experiences.description: Led a cross-functional team to improve a knowledge management platform with AI search capabilities.
keyNotes: Implemented AI-powered search in the KMS used by large enterprise clients.
Managed a distributed team of frontend, backend, and QA engineers.
Improved delivery cadence by streamlining collaboration between tech and business.

experiences.description: Led international projects across fintech and e-commerce. Built scalable web apps and internal tooling.
keyNotes: Led frontend/backend delivery for 3 client website migrations to modern tech stacks.
Developed mobile web features for a major Russian bank as guest engineer.
Improved interview pipeline for LatAm/Russian hires through technical leadership.
Owned architecture and delivery of internal management tools.

experiences.description: Sole developer for a geometry-heavy roofing estimation platform. Built cost optimization tools from scratch.
keyNotes: Built a high-performance frontend app with real-time geometric calculations.
Rewrote backend to reduce pricing algorithm latency from 2s to 50ms.
Implemented custom ray-tracing logic for 3D roof layouts.

experiences.description: Developed promotional websites and landing pages for global CPG brands.
keyNotes: Built fast, responsive websites for clients like Nestl√©, Danone, Colgate.

experiences.description: Freelancer and self-taught engineer focused on small business landing pages and learning web technologies.
keyNotes: Built 10+ landing pages and CMS themes for local businesses.
